plays.text: Penalty to Ric Jackman 2 minutes for Crosschecking Wade Dubielewicz
Goal scored by Miroslav Satan assisted by Trent Hunter AND Brent Sopel
Penalty to Radek Martinek 2 minutes for Holding Sidney Crosby
Penalty to Trent Hunter 2 minutes for Hooking Michel Ouellet
Goal scored by Sidney Crosby assisted by Michel Ouellet AND Mark Recchi
Penalty to Ryan Whitney 2 minutes for Holding Alexei Yashin
Goal scored by Miroslav Satan assisted by Mike York AND Brent Sopel
Penalty to Shawn Bates 2 minutes for Hooking Michel Ouellet
Penalty to Joel Bouchard 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to John Erskine 2 minutes for Hooking Ryan Malone
Penalty to Mark Recchi 2 minutes for Hooking Alexei Yashin
Goal scored by Miroslav Satan assisted by Joel Bouchard AND Mike York
Penalty to Colby Armstrong 2 minutes for Hooking Jason Blake
Penalty to Alexei Yashin 2 minutes for Holding(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Tomi Pettinen 2 minutes for Hooking Ryan Malone
Goal scored by Tomas Surovy assisted by Ric Jackman AND Ryan Malone
Penalty to Miroslav Satan 2 minutes for Hooking Michel Ouellet
Penalty to Brad Lukowich 2 minutes for Hooking Tomas Surovy
Goal scored by Mark Recchi assisted by Colby Armstrong AND Sergei Gonchar
Penalty to Shawn Bates 2 minutes for Tripping Eric Boguniecki
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Eric Boguniecki
Goal scored by Chris Campoli assisted by Jason Blake AND Alexei Yashin
Penalty to Tomi Pettinen 2 minutes for Interference Konstantin Koltsov
Goal scored by Ric Jackman assisted by Sergei Gonchar AND Ryan Malone
Mark Recchi shootout attempt against Rick DiPietro with a Wristshot results in a SAVE!
Michel Ouellet shootout attempt against Rick DiPietro with a Wide of Net results in a MISS!
Miroslav Satan shootout attempt against Marc-Andre Fleury with a Backhand results in a GOAL!
Trent Hunter shootout attempt against Marc-Andre Fleury with a Backhand results in a GOAL!
